import{SET_MESSAGE}from"../constants/reducers";var initialState={};// eslint-disable-next-line import/no-anonymous-default-export
export default function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_MESSAGE:return{message:action.payload};default:return state;}}
